name: honeycombed

containing many small holes in its structure: honeycombed with The tomb was honeycombed with passages and chambers. The mountains are honeycombed by mine tunnels. See
honeycomb
More examplesFewer examplesThe bluff is honeycombed with swallows' nests.The gorge abruptly narrowed into sheer and rocky walls that were honeycombed with dozens of caves.The honeycombed screen will filter debris from air travelling through the tunnel system.
